summary: Alternate KRJ login, and more reliable index composition for SP500/SP100/NDX100 with in-app warnings when counts are off.

features.title: Alternate Login Email for KRJ
features.summary: KRJ can now log in using a second email address in addition to their primary one.
features.description: Added backend support for KRJ to authenticate with an alternate email. Both addresses resolve to the same account â€” same alias, role, preferences, and session. No password change required.

features.title: Index Composition Warning on KRJ Signals
features.summary: When an index list (SP500, SP100, NDX100) has an unexpected ticker count, a clear notice is shown.
features.description: The KRJ Signals page now checks that system index lists have the expected number of constituents (e.g. S&P 500: 498-505). If the count is outside that range, an amber banner appears above the summary box. The weekly pipeline has also been hardened: it only overwrites constituent files when the fetched count is in the expected range and uses an optional FMP fallback for S&P 500 when Wikipedia is wrong.
